description: Exa Search toolkit for intelligent search and content retrieval with neural search capabilities.

metaphor_api_key.info: API key for accessing Exa Search (formerly Metaphor) services.

use_autoprompt.info: Enable autoprompt to automatically optimize search queries for better results.

search_num_results.info: Maximum number of search results to return.

similar_num_results.info: Maximum number of similar results to return when finding similar content.
